title: RIOT PLEASE
body: I am submitting requests for help and it wouldn't let me send a request. This is getting me angry. I need to have riot contact me please

replies.body: Not sure what you mean here, what is the ticket in regards to?  I'm happy to take a look as well if you want to toss me the ticket number, or did you mean that you're unable to create a ticket?  Let me know!
